snippet.title: Aurion: Legacy of the Kori-Odan - The 1st African-Fantasy 2D RPG on Steam (Official Trailer)
snippet.description:
Aurion is the energy that connects the desires of all living beings. The Aurionics are those who channel the Aurion to shape the world in their image.
An existential war opposes all the Aurionics who covet this supreme power: the future of humanity depends on it!
Discover the chronicles of these Homeric confrontations in the Kori-Odan saga.

#AurionLKO is a 2D RPG for PC available on Steam here 👉👉: http://store.steampowered.com/app/368080/

------------------------------------------------------------    Gameplay   -------------------------------------------------------------------------
Aurion is a 2D Action-RPG with real-time combat, aerial combos and ultimate skills. Immerse yourself in this unique Nubian Fantasy universe and experience Dantean duels with immersive dialogues. Fight as a king and summon your queen into battle!

------------------------------------------------------------   Follow us   -------------------------------------------------------------------------
https://aurionthegame.com/aurion-shop#order-here

Facebook: facebook.com/AurionheritageDesKoriodan
                    facebook.com/kiroogames

Twitter: @KIROOGames @Aurionthegame
